fieldUpdates.name: Change Lead Status back to New

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(UPPER(Country) = "UNITED STATES", "US", IF(UPPER(Country) = "USA", "US", IF(UPPER(Country) = "UNITED STATES OF AMERICA", "US", IF(UPPER(Country) = "CANADA", "CA", IF(UPPER(Country) = "CAN", "CA", "" )))))
fieldUpdates.name: Country Name - Convert to 2 Digit

fieldUpdates.formula: Case (State, "Alabama", "AL", "Alaska", "AK", "Arizona", "AZ", "Arkansas", "AR", "California", "CA", "Colorado", "CO", "Connecticut", "CT", "Delaware", "DE", "Florida", "FL", "Georgia", "GA", "Hawaii", "HI", "Idaho", "ID", "Illinois", "IL", "Indiana", "IN", "Iowa", "IA", "Kansas", "KS", "Kentucky", "KY", "Louisiana", "LA", "Maine", "ME", "Maryland", "MD", "Massachusetts", "MA", "Michigan", "MI", "Minnesota", "MN", "Mississippi", "MS", "Missouri", "MO", "Montana", "MT", "Nebraska", "NE", "Nevada", "NV", "New Hampshire", "NH", "New Jersey", "NJ", "New Mexico", "NM", "New York", "NY", "North Carolina", "NC", "North Dakota", "ND", "Ohio", "OH", "Oklahoma", "OK", "Oregon", "OR", "Pennsylvania", "PA", "Rhode Island", "RI", "South Carolina", "SC", "South Dakota", "SD", "Tennessee", "TN", "Texas", "TX", "Utah", "UT", "Vermont", "VT", "Virginia", "VA", "Washington", "WA", "West Virginia", "WV", "Wisconsin", "WI", "Wyoming", "WY", "Ontario", "ON", "Quebec", "QC", "QuéBec", "QC", "British Columbia", "BC", "Alberta", "AB", "Manitoba", "MB", "Saskatchewan", "SK", "Nova Scotia", "NS", "New Brunswick", "NB", "Newfoundland And Labrador", "NL", "Prince Edward Island", "PE", "Northwest Territories", "NT", "Yukon", "YT", "Nunavut", "NU" ,"")
fieldUpdates.name: State Name - Convert to Abbreviation

fieldUpdates.description: Change lead owner to Unqualified Leads Queue

rules.description: Automatic email sent to lead owner at creation or transfer

When an assigned lead has not been marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 30 days, a reminder email notification will be sent to the A&R representative and the A&R management team.
Automatic email sent to lead owner at creation or transfer

When an assigned lead has not been marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 30 days, a reminder email notification will be sent to the A&R representative and the A&R management team.

criteriaItems.value: Federal Military Contact a Teleflex Sales Rep

rules.description: Change owner of lead to Michelle Suarez if Specific Lead Source = Federal Military Contact a Teleflex Sales Rep

rules.formula: OR( UPPER(Country) = "USA", UPPER(Country) = "UNITED STATES", UPPER(Country) = "CANADA", UPPER(Country) = "UNITED STATES OF AMERICA", UPPER(Country) = "CAN" )

rules.description: When an assigned lead has not been marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 30 days, a reminder email notification will be sent to the Vascular representative and the Vascular management team.

Assigned lead not marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 28 days a notification is sent, 7 days to the owner, 14 and 21 days to the owner and their RSM, and 28 days notification to owner and RSM, marked overdue.
Sends email and changes status of lead to open when Resp lead score changes to A1, B1, C1, A2, B2
rules.formula: IF( AND( /* Cannot be NEW */ NOT(ISNEW()), /* Options */ OR( /* #1 - Value has moved up */ OR( /* AND #1 */ AND( OR(VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < VALUE(RIGHT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1)),ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c))), VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 4, LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "A"), /* AND #2 */ AND( OR(VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < VALUE(RIGHT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1)),ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c))), VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 3, LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "B"), /* AND #3 */ AND( OR(VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < VALUE(RIGHT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1)),ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c))), VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 3, LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "C") ), /* END #1 */ /* #2 Letter Moves Up */ OR( AND(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1) = "B", LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "A", VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 4), AND(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1) = "C", LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "B", VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 3), AND(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1) = "D", LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "C", VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 3), AND(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1) = "D", LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "B", VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 3), AND(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1) = "D", LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "A", VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 4), AND(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(RES_Lead_Score__c),1) = "C", LEFT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1) = "A", VALUE(RIGHT(RES_Lead_Score__c,1)) < 4) ) /* END #2 */ ) /* END Options */ ),TRUE,FALSE)

rules.description: When an assigned lead has not been marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 30 days, a reminder email notification will be sent to the Interventional representative and the Interventional management team.

rules.fullName: In Discussion Lead INTV%2CEMS%2CANES%2C VA%2C %26 ANZ
rules.description: 2022 Update Assigned lead not marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 28 days a notification is sent, 7 days to the owner, 14 and 21 days to the owner and their RSM, and 28 days notification to owner and RSM, marked overdue.

Only for Interventional and Vascular

rules.description: DO NOT USE - Old outstanding lead notification.
Assigned lead not marked as qualified or unqualified after 21 days, follow up email is sent to the RSM and a task for the rep is created.
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "New"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Contacted")), ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c , "Vascular"), Cancel_Workflow__c = FALSE, DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2018,10,10))

rules.description: Assigned lead not marked as qualified or unqualified after 7 days, 14 days, and 28 days a notification is sent, 7 days to the owner, 14 and 21 days to the owner and their RSM, and 28 days notification to owner and RSM, marked overdue.

Convert State Name to Abbreviation
rules.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(State)), /* Field is not Blank */ LEN(State) > 2 /* Length of the field is greater than 2 */ )

rules.description: 00031873 New Surgical Lead Notification to meet recipients

00031873 Updates Q2 '23 -Assignment of lead notification to both Rep AND RSM -Reminder email to Rep AND RSM at 7 days from assignment -Reminder email to Rep, RSM and Director at 14 days from assignment
Notifies lead owner if a lead is still open after 15 and 30 days
Temp workflow for Alternate Care Lead,Urology Lead,Respiratory Lead before we put into place perm WF for 7, 14 and 21 day alerts. This workflow is for historical leads.

00031873 Deactivated due to obsolete fields. Case 11415 - Creating single new lead notification for Anesthesia/EMS to exclude sample requests.
Case 00016478 - Requested to revert the change and not exclude sample requests.

rules.fullName: Universal New Lead Notification - except Surgical BUs
rules.description: New Lead Notification for All BUs except Surgical's BUs 00031873 4/19/17 added Anesthesia and EMS Case 00009772. 9/12 - removing Anesthesia and EMS - creating their own to exclude sample requests Case 11415
This rule is to update the Cancel Workflow Check box field when user manually selects the Lead Status as 'Convert'
This creates a task for the lead owner to follow up on with a due date of 7 days after date of creation.
Assign unqualified leads to the queue unqualified leads

tasks.description: Please follow up with this lead, update the lead status as appropriate and close this task!
tasks.subject: Follow up with this lead!
2nd Notice- Follow up with this lead!
